infos: - Added a page break before sorting in PDFs
- Alphabetical sorting of players in lists
- Added screen for selecting the supplement when the number of players does not allow for full matches
- Added Pointer, Shooter and Midfielder in Triplet
- Added consideration of rules (never same teammate, etc.) in Triplet
- Improved generation of melee and doubles matches
- Fixed display of the field to rename a player
- Fixed crash after deleting the current tournament
- Fixed player list name not being retained after list modification
- Fixed bug on the terrain screen
- Improved display of tabs and winning teams in the match list.
- The entire application has the new design.
- Translation of the application into Polish.
- Ability to display checkboxes upon registration.
- Options to assign matches to fields.
- New pages for: Settings, Tournament Type, Tournament Mode, Tournament Options.
- Fixed tournament generation in unraveled melee.
- Ability to assign players the roles of Pointer/Shooter/Midfielder in pairs to improve team balancing.
- Choose the number of points for victory.
- Creation of a community Facebook page and addition of a button on the home page.
- Added creation and modification date of a tournament.
- Ability to rename a player list.
- Fixed bugs related to player lists.
- Fixed the display of the application's light mode.
- Warning when a new update is available.
- Fixed a bug that prevented a tournament from loading.
- Added creation of player lists that can be loaded during registration to save time.
- Added display of more player suggestions.
- Added display of information from old tournaments.
- Added loading buttons when exporting to PDF.
- Improved generation of games without teams.
- Confirmation alert when deleting a tournament.
- Added a mail button on the home page.
- Button to start a tournament with 7 players disabled, because mode not supported.
- Fixed loading and saving of old tournaments.
- Fixed tournament generation with odd number of players.
- Added export of tournaments to PDF.
- Added player name suggestion during registration.
- Added a button to remove all players when registering.
- Fixed the display of old tournaments.
- Fixed focus on field for registration without names.
- Modification of player lists between different registrations.
- Changed the display of the ranking in the case of a match without a name.
- Names of players recorded in the match and no longer separately.
- Head-to-head and team modes at the same time become impossible.
- Bug in match generation in the case of a doubles tournament with triples complement. The complementary players were always the same.
- Improvements to player distribution for triples tournaments.
- In doubles, when the number of players is odd, it is possible to choose to have teams in triplets or head-to-head.
- Attention: If you have a tournament in progress, you will no longer be able to access it after this update!.
- Button to rate and leave a comment.
- Menu to choose tournament modes and doubles or triplets.
- Please note: Triplet and team modes do not work (for now).
- Registrations without indicating the names of the players, it is enough to indicate the number of normal and special players.
- Display of player numbers on the ranking page and on the score entry page.
- Display of the player's number in addition to his name if he has one.
- The application is now in the GCU colors.
- It becomes possible to launch tournaments with a number of players that is a multiple of 2 and only with a multiple of 4.
